Gene.FullName: DAZ interacting zinc finger protein 1 like
progestin and adipoQ receptor family member 9
splA/ryanodine receptor domain and SOCS box containing 4
transient receptor potential cation channel subfamily C member 1
U2 snRNP associated SURP domain containing
zinc finger and BTB domain containing 38

XRef.DB: Developmental Genetics Unit, King Faisal Specialist Hospital & Research Centre

AttributeSet.Attribute: The term 'not provided' is registered in MedGen to support identification of submissions to ClinVar for which no condition was named when assessing the variant. 'not provided' differs from 'not specified', which is used when a variant is asserted to be benign, likely benign, or of uncertain significance for conditions that have not been specified.

Classification.Comment: This CNV was detected in a symptomatic patient referred for CMA testing, but consent was not obtained to report individual clinical features
